short_summary: Purchase and Delivery of Category 6 Collaborative Furniture for the Manitoba Region
description: The Government of Canada intends to request proposals for the purchase and delivery of Collaborative Furniture for low-moderate security clearances office space for the Regional Lead Office region based in FSLC West.
tags: Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
full_summary:
**Purchase and Delivery of Category 6 Collaborative Furniture for the Manitoba Region**
==========================

### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-267-72424870
* **Amendment Number**: 11
* **Solicitation Number**: 100024991
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-11 T 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-19
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-01
* **Tender Status**: Expired


### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba


### Required Goods

Employment and Social Development Canada, Real Property, Change Management and Regional Services - West, requires the purchase and delivery of office furniture for collaborative spaces.

* **Location**: 61 Muir Road, Winnipeg MB R2X 2X7 (Delivery date: On or before March 1, 2024)
* **Product Category**: 6 - Support Space - Collaborative Furniture

### Additional Framework

This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and is exempt from international trade agreements.

### Contact Information

For more information on this tender, please refer to the attached documents or contact:

* Azlyn Roslan
* [NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
* (613) 794-1696

**Note**: Only documents attached via Canada Buys will be considered as part of this Request for Proposal.

Please ensure you follow the instructions outlined in the attached documents and response to any questions or clarification requests from the Contracting Authority. The closing date for submission of proposals is 2023-12-11 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time). Late submissions will not be accepted. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to reject any or all proposals. Thank you for your interest in this contract. 7 days extention allowed to submit the proposal. Please download the attached zip document. Thank you.  267---7242487



Note
